name: Pick Yourself Up
description:
Note: Due to Calc II exams and a nasty cold, this game is VERY rough around the edges, but I hope you can enjoy what I've made. (Example: You cannot currently die. You have to restart.)

Pick Yourself Up! Play as a robot that just can't keep himself together, and can't keep himself out of a fight.

Controller strongly recommended

Enter to go to next level

(Controller)

Left Joystick: Move      X: Dash      A: Jump      Y: Hit

(Keyboard)

WASD: Move      Comma : Dash      Period : Hit
